scripts.build: browserify -r queried -r emmy/on -r audio-context -r getusermedia -r ../audio-spectrogram:audio-spectrogram | ccjs - --language_in=ECMASCRIPT5 > bundle.js
scripts.watch: watchify -r queried -r emmy/on -r audio-context -r getusermedia -r ../audio-spectrogram:audio-spectrogram -d -o bundle.js
